CUSTOMGROUPINITIATIVE.GroupModeSettingHint: "Default": Use the systemâ€™s default grouping; "None": Do not group combatants (only works with D&D 5e); "Actor": Group combatants by base actor and average their initiative on combat start.
CUSTOMGROUPINITIATIVE.RoundInitiativeSettingHint: When Initiative Group Mode is set to "Actor", round the group initiative.
CUSTOMGROUPINITIATIVE.WarningModeNone: Custom Group Initiative: You have set Group Mode to "None". This currently only works with the D&D 5e system..
